question: Which type of procedure is involved in the impeachment of the President of India?
explanation:
The impeachment process of President of India is a quasi-judicial procedure in the Parliament. The nominated members of either House of Parliament can participate in the impeachment of the President though they do not participate in his
election also the elected members of the legislative assemblies of states and the Union Territories of Delhi and Puducherry do not participate in the impeachment of the President though they participate in his election.
